name: h5-dooring
description: H5-Dooring是一款功能强大，开源免费的H5可视化页面配置解决方案，致力于提供一套简单方便、专业可靠、无限可能的H5落地页最佳实践。技术栈以react为主， 后台采用nodejs开发。

scripts.start: npm run start:ui & npm run start:editor
scripts.start:editor: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/editor -- npm run start
scripts.start:ui: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/ui -- npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:editor
scripts.build:editor: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/editor -- npm run build
scripts.build:ui: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/ui -- npm run build
scripts.docs:dev: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/doc -- npm run dev
scripts.docs:build: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/doc -- npm run build
scripts.dev: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/editor -- npm run dev
scripts.test-demo: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/editor -- npm run test-demo
scripts.postinstall: npx lerna exec --scope={@h5-dooring/editor,@h5-dooring/ui} -- npm run postinstall
scripts.prettier: npx lerna exec --scope={@h5-dooring/editor,@h5-dooring/ui} -- npm run prettier
scripts.test: npx lerna exec --scope={@h5-dooring/editor,@h5-dooring/ui} -- npm run test
scripts.test:coverage: npx lerna exec --scope={@h5-dooring/editor,@h5-dooring/ui} -- npm run test:coverage
scripts.nocompress: npx lerna exec --scope @h5-dooring/editor -- npm run nocompress
